languages.text: После того, как Вольный Торговец покинул{mf||а} системы некронов, путь к ним был закрыт. Врата, ведущие к мирам-гробницам, контролировались Лорд-капитаном, и никто не ведал, хранит ли {mf|он|она} Человечество от опасностей, сокрытых по ту сторону врат, или же просто стал{mf||а} единоличн{mf|ым|ой} владетел{mf|ем|ьницей} ужасающих ксенотехнологий и тайн.

After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.
languages.original_text: После того, как Вольный Торговец покинул{mf||а} системы некронов, путь к ним был закрыт. Врата, ведущие к мирам-гробницам, контролировались Лорд-капитаном, и никто не ведал, хранит ли {mf|он|она} Человечество от опасностей, сокрытых по ту сторону врат, или же просто стал{mf||а} единоличн{mf|ым|ой} владетел{mf|ем|ьницей} ужасающих ксенотехнологий и тайн.

traits.locale_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to Tomb Worlds were under the Lord Captain's control, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond the gates, or if {mf|he|she} had made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to Tomb Worlds were under the Lord Captain's control, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond the gates, or if {mf|he|she} had made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

languages.text: Après le départ {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} des systèmes nécrons, la voie qui y menait fut close. Le portail vers les mondes-nécropoles demeurait sous le contrôle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, sans que l'on sache si son but était de protéger l'humanité des dangers qui s'étendaient au-delà, ou de s'approprier les terrifiants secrets et technologies des xénos.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Après le départ {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} des systèmes nécrons, la voie qui y menait fut close. Le portail vers les mondes-nécropoles demeurait sous le contrôle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, sans que l'on sache si son but était de protéger l'humanité des dangers qui s'étendaient au-delà, ou de s'approprier les terrifiants secrets et technologies des xénos.

languages.text: Después de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente saliera de los sistemas Necrones, el camino que llevaba a ellos se cerró. Las puertas a los mundos necrópolis seguían bajo el mando de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, y no había forma de saber si estaba protegiendo a la Humanidad de los peligros que había al otro lado o si simplemente se había convertido en propietari{mf|o|a} únic{mf|o|a} de las tecnologías y los secretos de los xenos.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Después de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente saliera de los sistemas Necrones, el camino que llevaba a ellos se cerró. Las puertas a los mundos necrópolis seguían bajo el mando de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, y no había forma de saber si estaba protegiendo a la Humanidad de los peligros que había al otro lado o si simplemente se había convertido en propietari{mf|o|a} únic{mf|o|a} de las tecnologías y los secretos de los xenos.

languages.text: 行商浪人离开太空死灵的星系之后，通往该星系的航线就被切断了。如今，通往墓穴世界的传送门处于行商浪人的控制之下，没人知道{mf|他|她}这么做是为了保护人类免于不为人知的威胁，还是为了让异形的技术与秘密彻底掌握在{mf|他|她}自己手中。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人离开太空死灵的星系之后，通往该星系的航线就被切断了。如今，通往墓穴世界的传送门处于行商浪人的控制之下，没人知道{mf|他|她}这么做是为了保护人类免于不为人知的威胁，还是为了让异形的技术与秘密彻底掌握在{mf|他|她}自己手中。

languages.text: ローグ・トレーダーがネクロンの宙域を去ったあと、そこへ通じる道は閉じた。墓世界へつながるゲートは、あのロード・キャプテン（{mf|he|she}）の支配下のまま。人間どもをその向こうの危険から守っているつもりなのか、それともゼノスの恐ろしい技術や秘密を自分{mf|himself|herself}だけのものにしただけなのか、誰にも分からない。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

traits.locale_text: ローグ・トレーダーがネクロンの宙域を去ったあと、そこへ通じる道は閉じた。墓世界へつながるゲートは、あのロード・キャプテン（{mf|he|she}）の支配下のまま。人間どもをその向こうの危険から守っているつもりなのか、それともゼノスの恐ろしい技術や秘密を自分{mf|himself|herself}だけのものにしただけなのか、誰にも分からない。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Nekron sistemlerinden ayrıldıktan sonra oralara giden yol kapandı. Kabir Dünyalara açılan geçitler, Lord Kaptan'ın kontrolü altında kaldı. Lord Kaptan'ın, İnsanlığı bu geçitlerin ötesinde gizlenen tehlikelerden mi koruduğu yoksa zenoların korkunç teknolojilerinin ve sırlarının tek sahibi mi olduğu bilinmiyordu.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader left the Necron systems, the path to them was closed. The gates leading to the Tomb Worlds remained under the control of the Lord Captain, and there was no telling if {mf|he|she} was protecting Humanity from the dangers lurking beyond them, or if {mf|he|she} had simply made {mf|himself|herself} the sole proprietor of the terrifying technologies and secrets of the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, Nekron sistemlerinden ayrıldıktan sonra oralara giden yol kapandı. Kabir Dünyalara açılan geçitler, Lord Kaptan'ın kontrolü altında kaldı. Lord Kaptan'ın, İnsanlığı bu geçitlerin ötesinde gizlenen tehlikelerden mi koruduğu yoksa zenoların korkunç teknolojilerinin ve sırlarının tek sahibi mi olduğu bilinmiyordu.
